short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that highlights recently made commits

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that enhances GitHub's repository view by highlighting recent commits, making it easier to track new changes in repositories that you're viewing.

Features
üé® Custom Highlight Color: Choose any color to highlight recent commits
üìÖ Configurable Time Range: Set how many days of recent commits to highlight
‚≠ê Most Recent Commit: Option to always highlight the most recent commit, regardless of its age
‚ú® Visual Feedback: Smooth animation effect when highlighting commits
üîÑ Real-time Updates: Changes take effect immediately as you navigate through GitHub
